> @mcp-servers/t-pane@0.4.0 build
> tsc && shx chmod +x dist/*.js

# t-pane MCP Server

An MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that enables Claude to execute commands in tmux
panes, providing a shared terminal experience between Claude and users.

## Features

- **Directory-Aware Pane Management**: Creates separate panes for each directory/projec
t
- **Command Execution**: Run commands in tmux panes with captured output
- **Smart Output Capture**: Uses unique markers to capture exactly the command output,
regardless of buffer size
- **Multiple Session Support**: Each Claude instance gets its own pane based on working
 directory
- **Session Persistence**: Commands remain visible in tmux for user interaction
- **Interactive Prompt Detection**: Automatically detects when commands require user in
put (passwords, confirmations, etc.)
- **Directory-Specific Logging**: Commands are logged to `.t-pane/logs/` in the current
 directory

## Installation

```bash
cd /Users/rumen.d/github/mcp-servers/t-pane
npm install
npm run build

command:
cd /Users/rumen.d/github/mcp-servers/t-pane && git commit -m "feat: Add experimental background task support (v0.4.0)

- New launch_background_task tool to create panes for research tasks
- check_background_tasks to monitor task status
- Tasks output to .t-pane/tasks/ directory
- Currently requires manual Claude invocation in created pane
- Safety boundaries: read-only tasks, time limits, specific output dir

This enables parallel Claude agents for background research while
maintaining safety through manual invocation requirement."

s" README.md
### 7. Check Background Tasks
Check the status of all background tasks.

```typescript

command:
cd /Users/rumen.d/github/mcp-servers/t-pane && sed -i '' '/^check_background_tasks()/a\
```\
\
### 8. Read File\
Read file contents using cat/head commands in the tmux pane.\
\
```typescript\
read_file({\
  filePath: "/path/to/file.txt",\
  lines: 50  // optional, show first N lines only\
})\
```\
\
### 9. Edit File\
Edit files using sed in the tmux pane (visible to user).\
\
```typescript\
edit_file({\
  filePath: "/path/to/file.txt",\
  search: "old text",\
  replace: "new text"\
})\

command:
cd /Users/rumen.d/github/mcp-servers/t-pane && git add -A && git commit -m "feat: Add read_file and edit_file tools for full t-pane workflow (v0.5.0)

- read_file: Uses cat/head to read files in tmux pane
- edit_file: Uses sed for visible file editing in tmux pane
- These tools enable disabling built-in Read/Edit for full t-pane experience
- All file operations now visible in shared terminal

This moves towards a fully transparent workflow where all operations
happen in the shared tmux pane, not hidden from the user."

cd /Users/rumen.d/github/mcp-servers/t-pane && cat > test-claude-config/test-claude.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Test Claude with t-pane only configuration

echo "Starting Claude with t-pane-only configuration..."
echo "Built-in tools disabled: Read, Edit, MultiEdit, Write, Glob, Grep, LS"
echo ""
echo "All file operations will happen through t-pane!"
echo ""

# Set custom config directory
export CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR="$(pwd)/test-claude-config"

# Launch Claude
claude "$@"
EOF
